tool.name: fromHicupToJuicebox
tool.description: Convert the output of hicup (as sam or bam) to the input of juicebox.

param.name: inputPairs
param.label: Select a file with the pairs as an alignment file (sam or bam). Both reads of a pair must be consecutive.

param.name: methodForFrag
param.label: Which method use to determine to which fragment belong a read.
param.help: hicup is 10 bp downstream the most upstream coordinate. hiclib is 4 bases after the 5' if strand is + and 4 bases before if strand is -.

param.name: useMid
param.label: Uses the position of the middle of the fragment instead of the 5'.

param.name: fragmentFile
param.label: Select a file with the coordinates of the fragments (digest).

param.name: colForChr
param.label: field number in the input fragment file (starting from 1) of the chromosome of each fragment.

param.name: colForStart
param.label: field number in the input fragment file (starting from 1) of the start position of each fragment.

param.name: colForEnd
param.label: field number in the input fragment file (starting from 1) of the end position of each fragment.

param.name: colForID
param.label: field number in the input fragment file (starting from 1) of the ID of each fragment.

param.name: lineToSkipInFragmentFile
param.label: Number of lines in the fragment file which are header.

tool.help: This tool was made from hicup_filter to make the output of the hicup compatible with juicebox/cooler etc: <readname> <str1> <chr1> <pos1> <frag1> <str2> <chr2> <pos2> <frag2> <mapq1> <mapq2> str = strand (0 for forward, anything else for reverse) pos = 5' of the read (position used to find the fragment in the 2 restriction enzyme mode but not for the sonication protocol where the position used to find the fragment is 10 bp downstream the most upstream coordinate of the mapped positions (the one given by bowtie)) or the middle of the fragment. R1 and R2 are switched if chr2<chr1 and the file is sorted by chr1 chr2
